select czb_user.user_id as userId, czb_address.receiver as userName, czb_user.user_account as userAccount, czb_vip_area_config.area, czb_user.create_at as createAt, DATE_ADD(max(czb_vip_recharge_records.create_at),INTERVAL 1 YEAR) as expireAt, case when czb_user.superior_user = czb_user.second_level_partner then 0 else 1 end as promotionType, superior_user as superiorUser, user2.receiver as superiorUserName, user2.user_account as superiorUserAccount, income.total_price as accumulatedConsumptionAmount, income.my_income as myIncome from czb_user left outer join czb_vip_recharge_records on czb_user.user_id = czb_vip_recharge_records.user_id left outer join czb_address on czb_user.user_id = czb_address.user_id left outer join czb_vip_area_config on czb_vip_recharge_records.vip_area_config_id = czb_vip_area_config.vip_area_config_id left outer join (select czb_user.user_id,czb_address.receiver,czb_user.user_account from czb_user left outer join czb_address on czb_user.user_id = czb_address.user_id) as user2 on user2.user_id = czb_user.superior_user left outer join (select czb_user.user_id, czb_petrol_sales_records.buyer_id, sum(czb_petrol_sales_records.current_price) as total_price, sum(czb_petrol_sales_records.current_price) * 0.003 as my_income from czb_user join czb_petrol_sales_records on czb_user.user_id = czb_petrol_sales_records.buyer_id group by czb_petrol_sales_records.buyer_id) as income on czb_user.user_id = income.buyer_id
czb_user.partner = 0
and czb_user.second_level_partner = #{userId}
and czb_user.user_account like concat('%',#{account},'%')
and czb_user.create_at like concat('%', #{createAt}, '%')
and czb_vip_area_config.area like concat('%',#{area},'%')
and user2.user_account like concat('%',#{superiorUserAccount},'%')
and czb_user.is_vip = #{isVip}
group by userId,userName,userAccount,czb_vip_area_config.area,promotionType,superiorUser,superiorUserName, superiorUserAccount,accumulatedConsumptionAmount,myIncome order by accumulatedConsumptionAmount desc

select sum( case when czb_income_log.create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 2 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then czb_income_log.amount else 0 end ) as firstData, sum( case when czb_income_log.create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then czb_income_log.amount else 0 end ) as secondData, sum( case when czb_income_log.create_at like concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 0 ${type}),#{format}),'%') then czb_income_log.amount else 0 end ) as thirdData from czb_user_income_info join czb_income_log on czb_user_income_info.info_id = czb_income_log.info_id where user_id = #{userId} and remark = '充值vip返佣' and is_settlement = 0
